text: Rodrigo de Souza Prado (born 11 September 1995), simply known as Rodrigão, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Ferroviária, on loan from Atlético Mineiro, as a defender. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |align="center"|Caldense |2016 |Série D |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |align="center"|Atlético Mineiro |2017 |Série A |3||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||3||0 |- |align="center"|Boa Esporte |2018 |Série B |13||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||13||0 |- |align="center"|Ferroviária |2019 |Série D |colspan="2"|—||7||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||7||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !17!!0!!7!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!24!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Clube Atlético Mineiro players Category:Associação Atlética Caldense players Category:Coimbra Esporte Clube players Category:Boa Esporte Clube players Category:Associação Ferroviária de Esportes players Category:Gil Vicente F.C. players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal
